name: Clay Brigade
description:
Description

Those careless smokers just can't stop starting forest fires by accident! Time for you, the Clay Brigade, to spring into action and save the forest!

This game was created in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022

Features
  • Exciting car action inspired by N64 classic Blast Corps
  • Charming clay look 
  • Cool HUD to play around with 
  • 20+ excellent original Songs on the radio!
  • Destructible water towers to tank your framerate
Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • H to honk!
  • Shift to boost
  • On screen dashboard - some buttons even work!
